title: Guides: Integrative Medicine Resource Guide: Core Resources
author: C Scott Dorris
description: This is a library research guide for students in the Integrative Medicine and Health Sciences Program of Georgetown University.
cleaned_text: to library and authoritative web-based resources for integrative medicine.](http://www.flickr.com/photos/megs_pics/1105030212/) This page highlights some core resources (selected by Dr. Hakima Amri); navigate to other sections of the guide by selecting the tabs on the left. If you have any suggestions for this guide, feel free to send them to the liaison librarian. Contact information is in the right column of this guide.
